mapper.insert: insert into order_products( order_id, option_item_id, quantity, price) values( #{orderNo}, #{optionItemNo}, #{quantity}, #{price})
mapper.select:
select op.quantity, op.price, od.order_id, od.member_id, od.payment_price, od.payment_date, od.payment_flag, od.payment_way, d.delivery_id, d.order_id, d.invoice_num, d.delivery_date, d.delivery_flag, d.courier_name, d.reciever_name, d.delivery_address, d.reciever_cell_phone, d.reciever_email, d.reciever_request, i.option_item_id, i.option_item_matters, i.options_price, i.options_quantity, o.options_id, o.product_id, o.options_name, p.product_id, p.group_id, p.member_id, p.registered_date, p.diy_flag, p.price, p.product_name, p.expiration_date, p.origin, p.quantity, s.tel, m.name
from order_products op
left outer join orders od on od.order_id = op.order_id left outer join deliverys d on d.order_id = od.order_id left outer join option_items i on i.option_item_id = op.option_item_id left outer join options o on o.options_id = i.options_id left outer join products p on p.product_id = o.product_id left outer join sellers s on s.member_id = p.member_id left outer join members m on m.member_id = s.member_id
where op.order_id=#{no}
